definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: He came from the “No pain, no gain” school of horticulture.
sentences.chinese: 他來自一個“不勞無獲”的園藝學校。

sentences.english: He came from the “No pain, no gain” school of 3)horticulture.
sentences.chinese: 他來自一個“不勞無獲”的園藝學校。
